scripts.clean: yarn nukenode && yarn clean:web && yarn clean:playground
scripts.clean:playground: cd playground && yarn nukenode && yarn clean:dist && cd ..
scripts.clean:web: cd web && yarn nukenode && yarn clean:dist && cd ..
scripts.refresh:web: cd web && yarn && yarn build && cd ..
scripts.refresh:playground: cd playground && yarn && yarn upgrade --latest && cd ..
scripts.refresh: yarn clean && yarn && yarn refresh:web && yarn refresh:playground
scripts.refresh:keypairs: solana-keygen new -o playground/keypairs/payer.json --force && solana-keygen new -o playground/keypairs/recipient.json --force
